verbose_text: In addition, similar to MMC, another ICL inducer, cis-platin, also induced robust centrosome amplification (supplementary material Fig. S7), suggesting that centrosome amplification is likely an integral part of the ICL induced response.
evidence: cis-platin, also induced robust centrosome amplification (supplementary material Fig. S7), suggesting that centrosome amplification is likely an integral part of the ICL
